CustomField.formula: IF(Title_Location__c = "", SBQQ__Account__r.BillingStreet & ", " & IF(SBQQ__Account__r.Billing_Street_Addr2__c = "","", SBQQ__Account__r.Billing_Street_Addr2__c & ", ") & SBQQ__Account__r.BillingCity & "," & TEXT(SBQQ__Account__r.BillingStateCode) & " " & SBQQ__Account__r.BillingPostalCode, Title_Location__r.Street__c & ", " & IF(Title_Location__r.AddressLine2__c = "","", Title_Location__r.AddressLine2__c & ", ") & Title_Location__r.City__c & ", " & TEXT(Title_Location__r.StateProvinceCode__c) & " " & Title_Location__r.ZipPostalCode__c )
CustomField.label: Title Address
